result.reason: Current implementation only signals activity on window title change; support for signaling on bell or general output requires intercepting window messages or hooks from the embedded PuTTY process.
result.approach: Investigate detecting window flashing (FlashWindow) from the embedded PuTTY process or implementing a hook to detect bell/output events and trigger the HasUnreadActivity property.
